document.masterDocTitle: Illustrated key to the species in the genus Sephina (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Coreidae: Coreinae: Spartocerini), with descriptions of three new species and new distributional records

subSubSection.paragraph: General distribution. Previously known from México . MEXICO : CHIAPAS : Lagunas de Montebello. PUEBLA : Necaxa ( Brailovsky & Sánchez 1983 , Packauskas 2010 , CoreoideaSF Team 2020 ).

Material examined. New records.
